mapper.select: select rno,num, replyer, replytext, regdate, (select count(*) from noticeBoard n where n.num=num) from NoticeReply r, member m where r.replyer = m.id and num=#{num} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into NoticeReply (rno, num, replyer, replytext, regdate) values (NoticeReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{replyer}, #{replytext}, sysdate)
